data.name: Encuentra_las_letras_T_K_8
data.value: Find the letters 'T', 'K' and the number '8'

data.name: Encabezado_juego_atencion3
data.value: Does the meaning above match the text color?

data.name: Historia1_ballena
data.value: Once upon a time,there was a whale called Elena,who was fat and good,and swims by the seas,like a mermaid

data.name: Historia2_jirafa
data.value: Once upon a time,there was a giraffe called Rafaela,who wore her grandfather's glasses,because from up there,she doesn't see an ax or jack,who thought that a pine tree was a very handsome giraffe

data.name: Historia3_gato
data.value: Once upon a time, a cat called Ruperto, that the house checks, because a little mouse, snores on the ledge, searches slowly, in every corner, but the sleepy cat, fell asleep in a corner, and ron ron ron, hoarse and hoarse mr mouse

data.name: Objetivo1
data.value: Develop the student's selective attention, which is the ability to focus on relevant information while ignoring irrelevant distractions.

data.name: Objetivo2
data.value: Develop the student's attention, making him focus only on finding Pikachu in the images to be shown.

data.name: Objetivo3
data.value: Improve the student's selective attention ability, so that by having several stimuli, they pay attention to only one in particular.

data.name: Objetivo4
data.value: Improve the quantitative reasoning and problem-solving skills that are needed to make intelligent decisions, including those related to procedural memory.

data.name: Objetivo5
data.value: To develop the student's memory, working with their temporary memories, through representative images. In addition, the aim is to get the student to learn about Ecuadorian culture.

data.name: Objetivo6
data.value: Develop short term memory as well as spatial memory by having the student remember the order of words that will be shown to them in different sentences that form a story.

data.name: Instrucciones1
data.value: The game consists of different levels, in which, you will have to click only on the letters that are asked for, and at the moment that you find all the requested letters, you will advance of level. If you click on any letter that was not asked for, you will be deducted points. Remember that the faster you finish, the more points you have.

data.name: Instrucciones2
data.value: The game consists of different levels, in which, there will be a Pikachu hidden among many people. You must click on it when you find it, and this way you will advance to the next level. If you click on another part of the image, you will be deducted points. Remember that the faster you finish, the more points you have.

data.name: Instrucciones3
data.value: You will be shown two words, you will have to look at the meaning of the word above and check if it matches the colour of the word below. That is, if the word above says 'Blue' and the colour of the word below is blue as well, you must click on the YES button, otherwise you must click on NO. As you advance in level, there will be more colors. Remember that the faster you finish, the more points you have.

data.name: Instrucciones4
data.value: The game consists of two levels, in which you will have random multiplications of two numbers. Below the multiplication you will be shown 4 different answers. To advance to the next operation, you must click on the correct answer, otherwise you will be deducted points. Remember that the faster you finish, the more points you have.

data.name: Instrucciones5
data.value: The game consists of 3 levels, in which you will be shown different images of three different provinces of Ecuador. You must memorize them and click on "Ready", then you will be shown an image of each province and you must write which one it belongs to.

data.name: Instrucciones6
data.value: The game consists of 3 levels. In which you must memorize the phrase and click 'Next', then you must write the phrase you memorized. In case you have written the sentence correctly, you will be shown the next sentence in the story, which you must also memorize, and then you must write what you have already written but adding the new sentence. And so on until you finish the story. Remember that the faster you finish, the more points you have.

data.name: Ayuda1
data.value: To enter the Attention Games you must click on the button on your left with the name "Attention Games".

data.name: Ayuda2
data.value: To enter the Memory Games you must click on the button on the left with the name "Memory Games".

data.name: Ayuda3
data.value: To change the theme of the application, you must enter settings and select the mode you want.

data.name: Ayuda4
data.value: To enable or disable the application sounds, you must enter the settings and choose the desired option.

data.name: Ayuda5
data.value: To change the language to English or Spanish, you must click on any of the buttons at the bottom of the menu.

data.name: Ayuda6
data.value: If you wish to open the Maslow School website, you must click on the institution's logo at the top of the menu.

data.name: Memoriza_la_frase_y_haz_clic_en_siguiente
data.value: Memorize the sentence and click on Next

data.name: Escriba_las_provincias_que_corresponden_a_las_imagenes
data.value: Write the provinces that correspond to the images

data.name: Recuerda_que_la_edad
data.value: Remember that the age we have set for each game is the one we recommend, but you can choose the one you want.
